channel.title: Im good with servers but need lil shop help
channel.description: [glow=green,2,300]Source -[/glow][glow=orange,2,300] RapeScape[/glow] Ok i downloaded the source off downloads on the downloads section and i got the RapeScape,non leeched it was the real thing with basic everything that came on it ok?.. so when i logged on a few other players came and everything went normal bkecause ive hosted many servers and then i went to shops to see whats in em and everytime i trade em it kicks me then when i talk nothing happens ..it kicks me for everyshop idk why?? i went to shops.cfg and everything looks normal...does anyone know whats rong or is it fucced up?

item.title: Im good with servers but need lil shop help
item.dc:creator: @who_run_it who run it
item.description:
@who_run_it wrote:

[quote=“0ops 0wn3d, post:2, topic:33784”]did you make the sure the shops are in client.java? If not then it wont know what to do when u trade it…[/quote]i got a shophandler.java and a shops.cfg

[quote=“crazy map, post:3, topic:33784”]hmm heres a link that can help (click on server help) www.sophos.com/pressoffice/news/articles/2006/11/pornspam.html[/quote] and crazy thats like the 5th time ive seen you post a fake URL that goes to gay shit now stop please

Read full topic
